name: Asteroids rematch
description:
Asteroids Rematch is a (very) simple 2D shooter. As this is my first game upload I am completely open for suggestions and tips on how to solve bugs. I used the amazing Unity game engine to create this game. I hope you will enjoy playing it with your friends.

Movement: 
   player1
   forwards / backwards: Z/S
   left/right: Q/D
   shoot / shield: A/E

   player2
   forwards / backwards: I/K
   left/right: J/L
   shoot / shield: U/I
